pesticide.PPE: Applicators and other handlers must wear protective eyewear, long pants and long-sleeved shirt, shoes plus socks and chemical resistant gloves.
pesticide.company_name: P49 HOLDINGS INC., D/B/A PACE 49 INC.

Safety_Information.general_Info: DANGER. Corrosive. Causes irreversible eye damage. Causes skin burns. Do not get in eyes, on skin or on clothing. Harmful if swallowed or absorbed through the skin. Wear protective eyewear (goggles, face shield or safety glasses), protective clothing and rubber gloves. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet. Remove and wash contaminated clothing before reuse.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15-20 minutes, then continue rinsing eye. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first 5 minutes, then continue rinsing the eye. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.if_Swallowed: Call a poison control center or doctor immediately for treatment advice. Do not induce vomiting unless told so by a poison control center or doctor. Do not give anything by mouth to an unconscious person.
Safety_Information.if_On_Skin: Take off contaminated clothing. Rinse skin immediately with plenty of water for 15-20 minutes. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Probably mucosal damage may contraindicate the use of gastric lavage.
